statements: SELECT * FROM past_legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date, outcome FROM past_legal_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT case_name, plaintiff, defendant FROM past_legal_cases WHERE plaintiff = 'John Doe';
SELECT case_name, outcome FROM past_legal_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled';
SELECT * FROM past_legal_cases ORDER BY case_date ASC, case_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM past_legal_cases WHERE case_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT plaintiff, defendant FROM past_legal_cases WHERE outcome = 'Settled' ORDER BY plaintiff, defendant;
SELECT case_name, outcome FROM past_legal_cases WHERE plaintiff = 'John Doe' AND defendant = 'Jane Smith';
SELECT * FROM past_legal_cases WHERE plaintiff LIKE '%Doe%' OR defendant LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY case_date;
SELECT case_id, case_name, case_date FROM past_legal_cases WHERE plaintiff = 'Alice Jones' AND outcome = 'Lost' ORDER BY case_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Legal_Cases;
SELECT case_name, court_name, case_type FROM Legal_Cases WHERE case_outcome = 'Pending';
SELECT model_name, model_type, accuracy FROM ML_Model ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Legal_Cases WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND case_type = 'Civil';
SELECT model_name, features_used, accuracy FROM ML_Model WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;
SELECT * FROM Legal_Cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal' ORDER BY case_id DESC;
SELECT case_name, court_name FROM Legal_Cases WHERE case_outcome = 'Guilty' LIMIT 10;
SELECT case_name, case_type, court_name FROM Legal_Cases ORDER BY court_name, case_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ML_Model WHERE accuracy > 90 ORDER BY model_id ASC;
SELECT model_name, features_used FROM ML_Model WHERE model_type = 'Regression' ORDER BY model_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_type, court_location FROM legal_cases WHERE case_status = 'Ongoing';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, law_firm FROM lawyers ORDER BY lawyer_specialty DESC;
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, admitted_to_bar_date FROM lawyers WHERE law_firm = 'Smith & Co';
SELECT case_name, prediction_label, predicted_outcome FROM case_outcomes WHERE prediction_score > 0.8 ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT case_name, case_status FROM legal_cases WHERE court_location = 'New York' AND case_status = 'Closed';
SELECT lawyer_name, lawyer_specialty, law_firm FROM lawyers WHERE admitted_to_bar_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM case_outcomes WHERE prediction_label = 'Successful' ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases lc JOIN lawyers l ON lc.case_id = l.lawyer_id WHERE lc.case_type = 'Civil' AND l.lawyer_specialty = 'Real Estate';
SELECT * FROM LegalCases;
SELECT case_name, case_type FROM LegalCases WHERE case_type = 'civil';
SELECT evidence_description, evidence_type FROM CaseEvidence WHERE evidence_type LIKE '%document%';
SELECT case_name, plaintiff_name, defendant_name FROM LegalCases WHERE case_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM MLModels WHERE model_type = 'classification' ORDER BY model_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM LegalCases WHERE case_type = 'Criminal';
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM LegalCases WHERE plaintiff_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM CaseEvidence WHERE evidence_type = 'Document' ORDER BY evidence_id DESC;
SELECT model_name, model_type, train_data_set FROM MLModels WHERE model_type = 'Classification';
SELECT * FROM CaseRulings WHERE judge_name = 'Judge Smith' AND verdict = 'Guilty';
SELECT * FROM legal_cases;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM legal_cases ORDER BY case_date DESC;
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM case_parties WHERE party_role = 'Defendant';
SELECT document_type, document_content FROM case_documents LIMIT 3;
SELECT case_id, feature_name, feature_value FROM case_features WHERE feature_value > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM legal_cases LIMIT 5;
SELECT case_name, case_date FROM legal_cases WHERE case_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT party_name, party_role FROM case_parties ORDER BY party_name DESC;
SELECT case_id, document_type, document_content FROM case_documents WHERE document_type = 'judgment';
SELECT feature_name, AVG(feature_value) AS average_value FROM case_features GROUP BY feature_name;
